{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=FVW318 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/02/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY3-FVM318 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5317 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=8 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Wireless |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''ProSafe Wireless VPN Security Firewall''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=FVW318|vs_id=2418}} The CPU is a S3C4510/S3C4510B. The wireless module is a '''Gemtek''' module per the FCC photos. According to the manual, the default SSID is '''Wireless'''.
